Type.BattleDialog: What a strange place I’ve ended up seeing.
It’s just as the reports described. It doesn’t quite… feel like a library, though.
I’m seeing familiar uniforms.
Is that how they steal the strength of the guests that have come here…
Anyways… I expect us to see each other often from now on, so nice to meet you.
They certainly weren’t pushovers…
Hopefully these books are helpful for learning about the Library.
We have a lot to report when we head back.
Is our director okay…
It seems the situation has been handled… Let’s go back.
I was too careless…
It’s a consequence we can do little about…
I knew… we weren’t strong enough on our own…
At least I’ll hold them back a little…
It’s unfortunate… But I suppose it’s time to let go.
…I’ve got to do what I can.
It should be fine for now… I’m sure.
…Is everyone else alright?
It’s going to be over soon… Hang in there, everybody.
The damage isn’t fatal. At least, not for now…
I see an opening in your defense. It seems you are fretful.
Only a few more to go.
Our side doesn’t seem to be having an easy time taking the lead.
I won’t lose track of them!
Keep your eyes on the surroundings.
Director Mirinae, should we get started?
Don’t worry, ma’am. We’ll finish this job and make it out alive.
Yes ma’am, we’ll assist you from the side.
Anyways… I expect us to see each other often from now on, so nice to meet you.
We’ll do this the usual way.
They were tricky opponents for sure…
Still, we managed to handle this without much trouble.
Is everyone okay?
Requests like this never fail to make me feel unnerved…
I think I’m fine… Take care of yourselves.
I’m not… upset.
Sorry, I can’t… any more…
As expected… We were not sufficient…
I was careless… I should have paid more attention…
I let my guard fall…
The damage isn’t fatal. At least, not for now…
…I’ve got to do what I can.
It should be fine for now. I’m sure of it.
…Is everyone else alright?
If we can’t retreat, then I’ll try to stand firm until the end.
I see an opening in your defense. It seems you are fretful.
Only a few more to go.
Our side doesn’t seem to be having an easy time taking the lead.
I won’t lose track of them!
Keep your eyes on the surroundings.
Focus. We don’t know what they’re capable of yet.
Let’s try to show some results.
I hope you’ll be able to demonstrate your abilities to the fullest.
I’d hoped you wouldn’t succumb so easily.
A desire doesn’t come without the risk of losing something of my own…
Try to stay composed.
If things don’t work out, that means this is as far as we were meant to go.
We didn’t come here without a plan.
Didn’t even have to make predictions.
Don’t lose your focus until it’s over.
It seems you underestimated us.
The distance is close… Let’s observe the opponent’s behavior first.
This shouldn’t be much different from the other Stars…
Director Mirinae. Are you prepared?
It was nothing too difficult…
The Star has already risen too high up in the sky…
It’s engulfing all that it comes across… stronger than I thought…
We can’t just back off…
The rest of us should be more careful.
…Yeah. We’ll be defeated at this rate.
I hope this will work out swimmingly…
…I’m starting to see the finish line.
Each one of them is strong, I can’t underrate them…
